features: EXCELLENT ANTI-SLIP: Linoows premium bathtub and shower mats with 200 special large suction cups that are more adsorptent than other small suction cups to help secure on smooth and clean surfaces. Our bathtub mats are a great choice for the home, gym, spa, and more!

SAFETY & UTILITY: 200 Domed designs are like pebbles, which provide massage experience in shower time, and effective textured surface pattern for reliable non-slip traction. Great for your babies, toddlers, kids, elderly and pets to bathe and shower safely.

OVERSIZED: Our extra large mat is 39 inch x 16 inch, 30% Longer than standard bath mats, which provides maximum coverage. A good drainage system consists of 176 drain holes that allow water to circulate. Enjoy a healthy better life with this bathmat on the tub or shower floor.

MACHINE WASHABLE: Our durable bath mat is machine-washable and easy maintenance and clean: you can simply toss the mat into the machine and clean it on cold water with gentle detergent (no bleach) and gentle cycle, refreshed after hang to dry.

CAUTION: Clean surface before using, wet surface. Place mat in position with suction cups down, press down to make the cups grip surface and hold, ensure mat is securely in place. Mat will only attach to clean, smooth surface. If there is a odor when the package is first opened, it is recommended to soak it for a few hours and ventilate it for a day before using it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Design the bathroom you deserve Linoows bathtub anti-slip mat makes your bathroom safer and more sanitary! Give yourself a happy shower time! Whether you are a person who likes to soak in the tub or stand directly under the shower. It is a good investment on a Non slip and just the right size bathroom mat. Not only the bath mat can be placed inside the bathtub but also outside the tub. In addition, it can also be used under the sink, in the kitchen. so will be perfect for daily use,and also can be a sweet gift for parents, relatives, friends, girls, kids and anyone you loved.

Bubble Design Distributed over 100 air bubbles on this extra-long bathroom mat, they are unique and beautiful, just like pebbles, providing a comfortable massage experience for your feet in the shower. Powerful Suction Cups Linoows bath and shower mats have 200 suction cups and can work on any smooth and clean bathtub or shower floor! The suction cups shape adopts octopus claw bionic design, which can provide strong grip. Drain Holes The bathtub mat features 176 drain holes to circulate water. Among them are 10 large drain holes in the middle, which provides flexibility for drainage in atypical locations. The texture of the surface provides good slip resistance.

Unique Large Size Shape The notch in the head of the bathroom mat perfectly matches the design of the tub drain. The large size of 39 X 16 inches provides maximum coverage. Machine Washable Machine washable and easy to care for. Just put the mat in the washing machine, cool it with a mild detergent (no bleach) and air dry. Instantly have a refreshed mat. High Quality Material Linoows non-slip bath mat is made of highest quality PVC materials, It is so soft and durable and not easily deformed. BPA Free, Latex Free, Phthalate free.

WHY CHOOSE OUR BATH MATS： - The bath mat grips the floor with plenty of suction cups and has a textured surface, so an adult or child will be safer in the tub or shower. - The mat has the perfect feel, does NOT slip, slide or move once you place it down. - Our wildly popular Extra Long Bath Mat providing excellent coverage in tubs and showers. - This bath mat is a great choice for the home, spa, sauna, gym, hotel and Many Other Places.

Clear Colors VS Opaque Colors Different Colors Are Available This Extra Long Non-Slip bathroom mat is divided into opaque color and transparent color (clear color). According to your bathroom style, choose our bath mats of different colors to add a touch of eye-catching color to your home and bathroom. Attention: We recommend rinsing and drying your bath mat periodically to remove oily and slippery buildup that may occur from various soaps and hair products. For best results, place in a wet tub and wipe your hand across the mat, applying moderate pressure po attach the suction cups onto the tub floor.The bath mat should be hung up over the tub or somewhere else after use so that air can circulate Underneath the mat. If you have a textured bathtub floor, please do not purchase this as it only will work on smooth surfaces.Bath oils or bubbles may reduce the mat's performance,as alwsys, please use caution when entering and exiting the tub, as well as when in the tub. this mat's effectiveness depends on your use and care.
Extra Large Bathtub and Shower Mat Upgrade Extra Large Bathtub and Shower Mat Many Colors ✓ ✓ Ultra-Durable ✓ ✓ Number of Suction Cups 200 300 Number of Bubbles 200 300 Number of drain holes 176 278

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mat fit in my tub perfect. It's very comfortable to stand on and you feel very secure. The suction cups work great. Water flows underneath it very well without much crud buildup at all. Very well made and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives excellent slip protection
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect in my standard size tub. Feels very secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but doesn't stick
reviews.reviewText: Yeah, I read the reviews before I bought this and did see that the suction cups were an issue. I also saw, though, a lot of people saying that for them it suctioned great, and little tips like making sure the tub is a little bit wet to help the cups grip better, so I figured I'd try it. And yeah, it doesn't stick in the slightest lol 😂😂😅😅 It's not too much of a nuisance! Generally I just have to fix it before I get in and it'll mostly stay in place from me stepping/walking on it. Other than that, it is a great mat! Good size, not transparent at all, the holes are nice so water and soap doesn't pool up in it too bad. Sometimes some suds do stay in the middle a little bit, but as long as you rinse the mat after your shower, you should be fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wet the bathtub floor before installing it, love this mat.
reviews.reviewText: To get the suction cups to grip great just wet down the tub floor first. Lay it out and walk down the length of it slowly with feet close together, walk across the entire mat trying to hit all the suction cups. This thing doesn’t budge, feels great on the feet too. We threw our old one away after having it for about six years. We tried a different kind & brand that had a textured top like rocks still made of rubber, but it was painful. We went back to this one, and are very happy with it. There is a smell when you first open it kind of like when you buy a new pool or pool accessories that you have to inflate. The smell does go away I didn’t notice it after a few days of use. This is literally brand new, so there is going to be a smell to it. It just has to be aired out. This is normal for any new silicone or rubber based product from a factory. Just like when you buy a brand new mattress, it may have some smells that need to off gas because of the materials used. If you buy a super cheap mat, that’s not gonna last long it may not have any smell, but it’s not gonna work is good either. This is a great product and I’m going to buy a third one as a back up to this one in case they ever stop selling it. They last a super long time. The only reason I had to throw my old one away was because I was really bad about cleaning underneath it. I bought it in white and over the years. It had changed color so I went with the light seafoam kind of green color this time and it’s beautiful in my bathroom. I would recommend this product, but definitely don’t expect to use it and have it stick if you put it on dry and then take a shower of course it’s going to slip around. Like any good suction cup it should have a little bit of moisture behind it to help it adhere fully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bath shower rug
reviews.reviewText: Great bath shower mat fits perfectly to, great price overall feels comfortable on your feet I would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: I ended up getting the wrong color but I still like this mat. I have had ones that are hard to clean or have holes in them. Definitely need to pull the mat up about once a week and clean under it. Has good suction and does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not stick!
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, feels good but the suction cups do not hold this mat in place!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mat for a toddler bath tub
reviews.reviewText: We all know toddlers are just little drunk people and add the slippery environment of a bath to that and they will fall in the tub in no time.We purchased this for that very reason and it covers the bottom of the tub completely and suctions down to hold sturdy to the tub. The top is grippy so our child doesn't slip as much when he ultimately stands in the tub. Highly highly recommend, plus it is kinda plush so it has a nice feel when they do fall.
J'AIME CE TAPIS TRÈS SATISFAIT IL S'AGRIPPE TRÈS BIEN AU BAIN ,JE N'AI PLUS BESOIN DE M'INQUIETTÉ DE TOMBÉ JE LE RECOMMANDE

Product is ok but MUCH smaller than described. I will be returning it. Product description says it is 39 inch length and 16 inch width. The product I received is only 26.5 inches length and 14 inches wide. Also I ordered the clear grey- however plain grey was delivered. Quality is ok - not A+ but probably B
This fit our tub so well. It's great for small kids that have baths. They won't slip. Great for no slip in the shower too.
